Description: 貴方はより親しくなった。安全なのだろうか？@{M}You've grown closer. Is that safe?
LevelDescriptionText: 60|Seeking knowledge of the Cladery Heart in Adam's Way~70|Gaining knowledge of the Cladery Heart in Adam's Way~80|Learning how to retrieve the Cladery Heart~90|Seeking the Cladery Heart in Khan's Shadow~20|Aware of the Cladery Heir's claims of parentage~30|Informed of the Cladery Heir's (possible) relationship to Mr Iron~100|Still seeking the Cladery Heart in Khan's Shadow~110|Looking for the Cladery Heart in Frostfound~40|Gathering details on the history of the Cladery Heir~120|Determining the future of the Cladery Heart~121|Finished choosing the fate of the Cladery Heart~115|Retriever of the Cladery Heart, which awaits in Port Carnelian
ChangeDescriptionText: 115|The Cladery Heart zails south.~120|The Heir looks resolute.~121|The matter is concluded.
Name: 人物観察: クラデリーの後継者@{M}Learning About: The Cladery Heir
